channel.title: Programming-Language on Peter Warnock
channel.description: Recent content in Programming-Language on Peter Warnock

item.title: TypeScript - JavaScript with Type Safety
item.description: TypeScript is a strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript, adding static type definitions to enable better development tooling and enhanced code reliability.

item.title: Go - Modern Systems Programming Language
item.description: Go is a modern systems programming language designed for simplicity, reliability, and efficiency. Perfect for backend services, CLI tools, and high-performance applications.
